body:
What is the fastest (computationally) way to look up a single pixel value
in a radiance picture?
currently I'm doing it like this:


pcompos -x 1 -y 1 pic.hdr -300 -450 | pvalue -o -h -b -H -d


is there a better way?




Thanks,


Stephen Wasilewski
*LOISOS *+* UBBELOHDE*
